Name: Empire Cocktail
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
22.5 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of apricot slice on rim or orange zest twist.
Review: Apricot fortified by gin and apple brandy. Craddock's 1930 recipe calls for this cocktail to be shaken rather than stirred, indeed it's a cocktail that benefits from a little dilution, hence the addition of water.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Empire Cocktail contains 204 calories
